name: DMerge
short_description: The DMERGE is a tool which can be used to merge multiple .NET assemblies into the single one. In general, DMERGE is a Graphical User Interface build on the top of ILMerge.DMERGE has been developed by DAENET team to extract the user controls(ASPX.PAGES)
